answers.answer: hello,sorry to tell you that garlic pills won't prevent you getting diabetes.if you are pregnant and suspecting diabetes or even issues with blood sugar, you need to tell your dr straight away and get tested.  It is critical for your and the baby's health that blood sugar is very well controlled uring pregnancy.

question: Is it likely that its hard for me to get diabetes because I use to take garlic pills EVERYDAY and even a whole 2 weeks before I found out I was pregnant? Someone please answer .
title: Garlic pill prevention?
